snippet: The police have detained a Chinese township official on suspicion that he murdered a business associate by dropping a poisonous herb into a cat-meat stew.
abstract: Shanghai police detain a Chinese township official Huang Guang on suspicion that he murdered tycoon Long Liyuan by dropping a poisonous herb into a cat-meat stew.
lead_paragraph: The police have detained a Chinese township official on suspicion that he murdered a business associate by dropping a poisonous herb into a cat-meat stew.

headline.seo: Chinese Tycoon Dies After Eating Poisoned Cat Stew
headline.main: Poisonous Herb Spices Cat Stew in Felonious Pot
headline.print_headline: Poisonous Herb Spices Cat Stew In Felonious Pot
